Name: SESSION_SCROLL
Label: Enable auto session scroll
Description: Allow page scrolling after receiving a challenge/message in a session.

Name: VIEW_POSTS
Label: Enable view all published challenges.
Description: See published challenges from all users.

Name: SUBMIT_SESSION_ANSWER_WITH_ENTER
Label: Enable submit session answer with enter.
Description: Press enter to submit answers/messages in a session.

Name: SUBMIT_CHAT_MESSAGE_WITH_ENTER
Label: Enable submit chat message with enter.
Description: Press enter to submit messages in a chat.

Name: SUBMIT_PUBLISHED_CHALLENGED_COMMENT_WITH_ENTER
Label: Enable submit published challenge comment with enter.
Description: Press enter to submit published challenge comments.

Name: SESSION_COMMANDS_LIST_MESSAGE
Label: Enable session commands list message.
Description: See commands list message when joing a session.
